comprehensive_overview: Climate Data Operators (CDO) is a collection of command-line operators for manipulating and analyzing climate and numerical weather prediction (NWP) model data.
core_features: Supports a wide range of file formats including GRIB, NetCDF, HDF, and more
Provides tools for data selection, slicing, aggregation, interpolation, calculation, and visualization
Enables batch processing and scripting for automatic data processing
Includes comprehensive documentation and support for a variety of operations on climate data
